description:
| Learn how to harness the power of a robust, cross-platform and
  extensible GUI framework.
| Topics include:

-  good-looking cross-platform designs
-  best practices
-  extensibility and custom widgets (AGW library)
-  lessons-learned
-  tips and HOWTOs
-  Phoenix: the next generation of wxPython
title: “import wx”: a Tale of Neverending GUI Power
